ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Close the imager window (i.e., exit ds9).

DESC.PARA: Sherpa has an interface to the ds9 imager. The image_close() function closes the imager window (i.e., exits ds9). It returns no value and accepts no input arguments. The image_open() function can be used to open a blank imager window (i.e., a ds9 display with no image loaded).
The image_close() function closes an imager window (ds9) opened by a previous command in the Sherpa session.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
